Text:
Various Artists - 101 Classics - CD 4 (8) Adagio - Music For Relaxing

01  Albinoni - Adagio in G minor (attrib. to Albinoni)
02  Bach - Violin Concerto in E major, BWV 1042; II. Adagio
03  Telemann - Trumpet Concerto in D major, TWV 51;D7; I. Adagio
04  Albinoni - Oboe Concerto in D minor, Op. 9, No. 2; II. Adagio
05  Mozart - Piano Concerto No. 23 in A major, K. 488; II. Adagio
06  A. Marcello - Oboe Concerto in D minor; II. Adagio
07  Mozart - Oboe Quartet in F major, K. 370; II. Adagio
08  Bruch - Violin Concerto No. 1 in G minor, Op. 26; II. Adagio
09  Mozart - Clarinet Concerto in A major, K. 622; II. Adagio
10  Rodrigo - Concierto de Aranjuez; II. Adagio
11  Mozart - Violin Concerto No. 3 in G major, K. 216; II. Adagio


Various Artists - 101 Classics - CD 5 (8) Largo - Music for reading

01  Händel - Serse (Xerxes), HWV 40, Act I; Ombra mai fu, ''Largo''
02  Bach - Piano Concerto in F minor, BWV 1056; II. Largo
03  Händel - Concerto Grosso in A minor, Op. 6, No. 4, HWV 322;
             III. Largo, e piano
04  Vivaldi - Guitar Concerto in D major, RV 93; II. Largo
05  Corelli - Concerto Grosso in C minor, Op. 6, No. 3; I. Largo
06  Bach - Concerto for 2 Violins in D minor, BWV 1043; II. Largo ma non tanto
07  Vivaldi - Flautino Concerto in C major, RV 443; II. Largo
08  Händel - Oboe Concerto No. 3 in G minor, HWV 287; III. Sarabande- Largo
09  Vivaldi - Concerto for Oboe and Violin in B flat major, RV 548; II. Largo
10  Dvorák - Symphony No. 9 in E minor, Op. 95, B. 178,
             ''From the New World''; II. Largo
11  Vivaldi - The 4 Seasons; Violin Concerto in F minor, Op. 8, No. 4,
              RV 297, ''L'inverno'' (Winter)- II. Largo
12  Chopin - Piano Concerto No. 2 in F minor, Op. 21; II. Larghetto


Various Artists - 101 Classics - CD 6 (8) Opera Highlights

01  Bizet - Carmen, Act I; Prelude
02  Puccini - Gianni Schicchi; O mio babbino caro
03  Bizet - Carmen, Act II; Couplets; Votre toast, je peux vous le rendre
04  Mascagni - Cavalleria rusticana; Intermezzo
05  Mozart - Die Zauberflöte (The Magic Flute), K. 620,
             Act II; Der Holle Rache … (Queen of the Night)
06  Verdi - La traviata, Act I; Brindisi; Libiamo ne'lieti calici,
            ''Drinking Song''
07  Puccini - Turandot, Act III Scene 1; Nessun dorma
08  Puccini - Tosca, Act III; E lucevan le stelle
09  Händel - Rinaldo, Act II Scene 4; Aria, Lascia ch'io pianga
10  Mozart - Le nozze di Figaro (The Marriage of Figaro), K. 492; Overture
11  Puccini - Madama Butterfly, Act II; Un bel di, vedremo
12  Bizet - Les pecheurs de perles, Act I; Au fond du temple saint
13  Rossini - Il barbiere di Siviglia (The Barber of Seville),
              Act I; Largo al factotum
14  Verdi - Aida, Act II; Triumph March - Gloria all'Egitto
15  Verdi - Rigoletto, Act III; La donna e mobile
16  Puccini - La Boheme, Act I; Si. Mi chiamo Mimi


Various Artists - 101 Classics - CD 7 (8) Mostly Baroque

01  Händel - Solomon, HWV 67, Act III; Sinfonia,
             ''Arrival of the Queen of Sheba''
02  J. S. Bach - Overture (Suite) No. 3 in D major, BWV 1068; II. Air,
                 ''Air on the G String''
03  J. S. Bach - Overture (Suite) No. 2 in B minor, BWV 1067; VII. Badinerie
04  Vivaldi - The 4 Seasons; Violin Concerto in E major, Op. 8, No. 1,
              RV 269, ''La primavera'' (Spring); I. Allegro
05  Händel - Music for the Royal Fireworks, HWV 351; IV. La rejouissance
06  J. S. Bach - Toccata and Fugue in D minor, BWV 565; Toccata
07  Haydn - Trumpet Concerto in E flat major, Hob.VIIe-1; III. Finale; Allegro
08  Mozart - Piano Concerto No. 21 in C major, K. 467,
             ''Elvira Madigan''; II. Andante
09  Beethoven - Symphony No. 5 in C minor, Op. 67; I. Allegro con brio
10  Mozart - Serenade No. 13 in G major, K. 525, ''Eine kleine Nachtmusik'';
             I. Allegro
11  Gluck - Orfeo ed Euridice, Act II; Dance of the Blessed Spirits
12  Pachelbel - Canon in D major
13  Beethoven - Romance No. 2 in G major, Op. 50


Various Artists - 101 Classics - CD 8 (8) Mostly Romance

01  Grieg - Peer Gynt Suite No. 1, Op. 46; I. Morn

Various Artists - 101 Classics - CD 8 (8) Mostly Romance

01  Grieg - Peer Gynt Suite No. 1, Op. 46; I. Morning
02  Schubert - Ellens Gesang III (Ave Maria!), Op. 52, No. 6, D. 839, ''Hymne an die Jungfrau'' (arr. P. Breiner)
03  Mozart - Serenade No. 13 in G major, K. 525, ''Eine kleine Nachtmusik''; II. Romance
04  Boccherini - String Quintet in E major, G. 275; III. Minuetto
05  Godard - Jocelyn, Suite No. 2; Berceuse
06  Brahms - 21 Hungarian Dance, WoO 1; No. 5 in G minor (arr. Schmeling for orchestra)
07  R. Strauss - Also sprach Zarathustra, Op. 30, TrV 176; Introduction
08  Elgar - Military March No. 1 in D major, Op. 39, ''Pomp and Circumstance''
09  Grieg - Lyric Pieces, Book 8, Op. 65; No. 6. Wedding - Day at Troldhaugen (arr. for orchestra)
10  Schubert - 3 Marches Militaires, Op. 51, D. 733; No. 1 in D major (arr. P. Breiner for orchestra)
11  Grieg - Peer Gynt Suite No. 1, Op. 46; IV. In the Hall of the Mountain King
12  Grieg - 2 Elegaic Melodies, Op. 34; II. Våren (Last Spring)
13  Smetana - Ma vlast (My Fatherland); No. 2. Vltava (Moldau)
